entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h near midnight. Temperature rising to minus 20 by morning. Wind chill near minus 36. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow at times in the morning. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 22 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Saturday 24 December 2022
